msg.msgText:
A "LogAutoTransfer" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command. The "LogAutoTransfer" composite object defines the settings that are used for automatic log transfers.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete LogAutoTransfer help
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete LogAutoTransfer

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
